values: If something is slight, then it is small or minor.
There was only a slight change in the little boy’s height.
v. to offend or insult 轻视
adj. very small in degree or amount 微不足道的
n. 怠慢；轻蔑 adj. 轻微的，少量的；脆弱的；细长的；不重要的 vt. 轻视，忽略；怠慢

To slight is to insult or disrespect someone by treating them as unimportant or insignificant.
Small or insignificant in degree, or having a slender or delicate build.
